purpose: Handles HTTP calls from S4 system to external world

methods.name: CALL_PUBLIC_API
methods.purpose: Makes API call to the requested end point with the provided HTTP Method and Payload. Please note RFC Destination is required for this method to work and is prefferred approach within Shell.

importingParameters.name: IV_HTTP_METHOD
importingParameters.description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)

exportingParameters.name: EV_ERROR_MESSAGE
exportingParameters.description: Error message if API call fails

purpose: Handles HTTP calls to BTP for fetching MoA Approvers

methods.name: GET_APPROVERS
methods.purpose: Get list of MoA approvers stored in BTP based on the input parameters provided.

importingParameters.name: IV_COST_CENTER
importingParameters.description: Cost center code for filtering approvers

importingParameters.name: IV_APPROVAL_TYPE
importingParameters.description: Type of approval (Purchase, Payment, Leave, etc.)

exportingParameters.name: ET_APPROVERS
exportingParameters.description: Table of approvers with ID, name and email

changingParameters.name: CH_MAX_RECORDS
changingParameters.description: Maximum number of records to retrieve

methods.name: GET_APPROVER
methods.purpose: Gets a single MoA approver stored in BTP based on the input parameters provided.

exportingParameters.name: ES_APPROVER
exportingParameters.description: Approver details including name, email, and authorization level

exportingParameters.name: EV_FOUND
exportingParameters.description: Flag indicating if approver was found

methods.name: IS_VALID_APPROVER
methods.purpose: Checks if provided Approver is valid or not by checking information stored in BTP MoA based on the input attribute provided

importingParameters.name: IV_ATTRIBUTE
importingParameters.description: Attribute to validate (STATUS, ACTIVE, DELEGATION, etc.)

exportingParameters.name: EV_IS_VALID
exportingParameters.description: True if approver is valid, False otherwise
